did.abstract: One letter, dated March 14, 1800, from Augustus Cornwall of Cow Neck, Long Island, N.Y. (present-day Port Washington), to his nephew. The letter relates to the purchasing of a Young Gentleman and Lady's Monitor and various family affairs.
